== Examples

=== Call a libc function

This is an example of loading libc.so and calling a function on linux.

[source,yaml]
----
pipeline:
  processors:
    - ffi:
        library_path: libc.6.so
        function_name: memcmp
        args_mapping: 'root = ["foo", "bar", 3]'
        signature:
          return:
            type: int32
          parameters:
            - type: byte*
            - type: byte*
            - type: int64
----
